blocks.content: Notification policies determine how alerts are routed to contact points and control when notifications are sent. You'll create a notification policy and configure it with a contact point.
Navigate to **Alerts & IRM > Alerting > Notification configuration**.
In the **Name** field, enter a unique name for this policy, for example `Platform team alerts`.
In the **Default contact point** dropdown, select the contact point where notifications should be sent, for example `grafana-default-email`.
Leave the **Group by** and **Timing options** at their defaults for now. You'll add mute timings to this policy in the next milestone.
Click **Create** to save the notification policy. The policy now appears in the Notification policies list.
